name: Mom Koser's Cranberry Pineapple Salad
comments: This is great at Thanksgiving for something other than plain cranberry sauce! Do NOT use fresh pineapple; it will keep the jello from setting.
instructions: In a bowl, dissolve jello in boiling water. Break in cranberry sauce. Add remaining ingredients except nuts and chill until partially set.
Stir in nuts and pour into pan. Chill until firm.
